Is this a good place to ask beginner ubu: I'm new to linux and I'm trying to get Ruby for ubuntu and the website says get it via "%sudo apt.-get...." where do i enter that?
The last word on that apt-get line is the package you need to install. You can search for it in System -> Administration -> Synaptic package manager and install from there instead if you like
Otherwise, such commands are meant to be run in a terminal, which you'll find at Applications -> Accessories -> Terminal
